title: Difference between that and that's? - Quora

response.answer_text: That can be used both as Demonstrative Pronoun and Demonstrative Adjective . E.g. That is a dog ( = as a Demonstrative Pronoun ) . That dog is mine ( = as a Demonstrative Adjective ) . But , That's is the contraction of either ' That is or That has ' . It is only Demonstrative Pronoun .
